welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hoofddorp, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hoofddorp has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, mainly used for flights within Europe.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily used for intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. A login is required and can be obtained at the airport information desks.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Soesterberg Air Base Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
